Game.Name: Soap Panic (Japan) (Unl)
Game.plot: Far below, from the dark and murky depths, another shiny bubble cluster rises. Though very beautiful, the strangely quivering bubbles are part of a sinister plan, concocted by the evil Emperor O-Dinten. With the patented Dura-Bubble, he plans to profit from fun itself by controlling all the games under the sea. Can you stop him and restore 'The Freedom to Have Fun' to the undersea world of Atlantis? It's a brain-bursting bubble battle to pop thousands of beautiful bubbles before they overflow to the open sea!Cheat: Level Select (Early Versions Only)Start new game, then while "STAGE #-#" message is displayed on the screen, press Start to pause the game, then press Up, Right, Down, Left. From now you can change level and sublevel numbers by pressing B and A buttons accordingly. Press Start to end level editing, then press Start again to turn off pause mode and begin playing the selected level.
